text:
[Alear] 1 
[Chloé] 2 

[Alear] 
You know, I've noticed how often you bring up 
your wish to live a fairy-tale life...

[Chloé] 
Uh-huh. I've wanted that for myself ever since 
I was a child.

[Chloé] 
I was born into a noble family. Everything in my 
life was planned out for me by my parents.

[Chloé] 
My role as a noble daughter was to get married 
and then devote myself to my partner's family.

[Chloé] 
They wouldn't even let me eat the street food 
I love so much.

[Chloé] 
It wasn't ordinary for a noble girl. I hated every 
part of that life.

[Alear] 
I had no idea.

[Chloé] 
The life I wanted for myself was free, thrilling, 
and very out of the ordinary.

[Alear] 
I didn't mean to stir up so many painful 
memories, Chloé.

[Chloé] 
Oh, it's OK. They're just memories. And my 
dream came true when I got to be a knight.

[Chloé] 
Meeting Princess Céline─and you─let me live 
the kind of life I always fantasized about.

[Chloé] 
Isn't fighting alongside the Divine Dragon and 
the royal family better than any fairy tale?

[Alear] 
When you put it like that, you might be right.

[Chloé] 
I wonder if they'll tell stories about this 
war someday.

[Alear] 
It's certainly possible. And when they do...

[Alear] 
I wouldn't be surprised if you ended up as a 
major character in them.

[Chloé] 
What?! I...never thought about that. But it's a 
nice idea!

[Chloé] 
I must become the kind of virtuous knight little 
kids aspire to be when they hear the story.

[Alear] 
You're already well on your way there, Chloé.

[Chloé] 
Haha, thanks, Divine One.

[Alear] 1 
[Chloé] 2 
[Chloé] 
You slept for a thousand years.

[Chloé] 
And when you woke, you were thrust into battle 
against the forces of evil.

[Chloé] 
You're the absolute picture of a fairy-tale hero!

[Alear] 
Uh...am I?

[Chloé] 
Oh yes. One doesn't meet people as 
extraordinary as you every day.

[Chloé] 
Yours is not the average person's life. You are 
fated for exhilaration and excitement!

[Chloé] 
Oh, how I wish it were mine...

[Alear] 
I don't know...

[Chloé] 
What? Why not?

[Alear] 
There are many burdens I must bear, and while 
I don't regret this life...

[Alear] 
You're absolutely right that my days will never 
be considered average.

[Alear] 
Sometimes, average seems like it might not 
be so bad.

[Chloé] 
Oh. I'm really sorry about that. I was just so 
swept up in my own desire for a fairy-tale life...

[Chloé] 
I didn't stop to consider how someone already 
living one might feel.

[Alear] 
You don't have to apologize, Chloé. I know you 
didn't mean anything by it.

[Chloé] 
I still feel a little guilty, though.

[Chloé] 
Oh, I know! I'll bring you a special, delicious 
treat as an apology.

[Chloé] 
There's this rare, pickled, deep-sea fish I've 
been into. It's sour enough to knock you flat!

[Chloé] 
I'll go fetch some right now. You're gonna 
love it!

[Alear] 
No need! Really! I'm getting queasy enough 
just picturing it!

[Alear] 1 
[Chloé] 2 

[Alear] 
...

[Chloé] 
Hehehe, you're so adorable when you sleep, 
Divine One.

[Alear] 
Huh?!

[Chloé] 
Oh, good morning. Did I wake you?

[Alear] 
Were you watching me sleep? Again?!

[Chloé] 
Yes. Sorry about that.

[Alear] 
You should just leave me be if I nod off while 
I'm sitting outside.

[Alear] 
It's unnerving to wake up on your own and find 
someone staring at you.

[Chloé] 
Oh, I never mean to do that, Divine One.

[Chloé] 
But you slept for a thousand years, just like 
a character from a fairy tale.

[Chloé] 
Your sleeping form is so heavenly that I can't 
help staring at it.

[Alear] 
I get that. But I still must have been a ridiculous 
sight, sleeping here of all places.

[Chloé] 
Oh, no! Not at all.

[Chloé] 
But I have a compromise in mind. Hear me out.

[Chloé] 
If I'm always there when you wake up, maybe 
you'll get used to it and it won't be so startling.

[Chloé] 
All we'd have to do is set up an extra bed for 
me in your chamber.

[Alear] 
Nope! Not doing that!

[Chloé] 
Oh dear. Shot down...

[Alear] 1 
[Chloé] 2 

[Alear] 
I think you've been rubbing off on me, Chloé.

[Chloé] 
I have? How?

[Alear] 
Just like you wish for a fairy-tale life, I've been 
thinking about a dream life of my own.

[Chloé] 
Well, I think that's wonderful!

[Chloé] 
Now that you have an idea of what your dream 
is, you can start to make it real.

[Alear] 
It might not be that simple.

[Alear] 
There are parts of this dream I can't fulfill 
by myself.

[Chloé] 
What else do you need?

[Alear] 
You, Chloé.

[Chloé] 
Me?!

[Alear] 
When I think about the life I want after the war, 
it feels hollow if you're not in it somewhere.

[Alear] 
And if you're the hero of your own fairy tale, 
I want to be your supporting character.

[Chloé] 
Oh my goodness...

[Alear] 
If you feel the same way, then I hope you'll 
accept this gift.

[Alear] 
I saved it just for you.

[Chloé] 
This is the Pact Ring...

[Alear] 
You were right when you said that mine is not 
the average person's life.

[Alear] 
And it may be a lot to ask for you to share in 
that life, knowing it won't be ordinary.

[Alear] 
But I had to know.

[Chloé] 
You had only to ask, .

[Chloé] 
I never wanted an ordinary life. The chance to 
see myself in your story...

[Chloé] 
I can't think of a happier ending than that.

[Alear] 
Well?

[Chloé] 
Of course I'll wear the ring. And I'll be right 
there, building your dream along with you.

[Alear] 
Thank you, Chloé.

[Chloé] 
Today is the opening chapter of the tale of the 
Divine One and me. A story for the ages!
